alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell; Claiborne; Morgan; Scott; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 11:11AM CDT until August 07 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morgan County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Claiborne County in east Tennessee... Northern Anderson County in east Tennessee... Campbell County in east Tennessee... Southern Scott County in east Tennessee... Western Union County in east Tennessee... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1210 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Huntsville, or 14 miles south of Oneida, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, La Follette, Jacksboro, Huntsville, Helenwood, Jellico, Caryville, Rocky Top, Norris and Sunbright. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 121 and 155. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Campbell; Claiborne; Morgan; Scott; Union
